tag_list: evan-jacobs, evan-jacobs-marketing, evan-jacobs-design, evan-jacobs-boston, marketing-in-boston, design-in-boston
overview:
Evan Jacobs is an e-marketer, visual designer and brand strategist living in the Boston area.

He began his career at Suffolk University, originally to study pre-law. After discovering his love of the visual arts and realizing a fascination with business, marketing became his primary discipline. During Evan’s time at Suffolk, he concentrated his studies on brand management, visual design principles and e-marketing strategy.

Evan has worked in several industries, including consumer electronics (Apple), market research (Schlesinger Associates), nonprofit advertising (Springboard) and higher education marketing (Edvisors).

In his personal life, Evan is a passionate technology enthusiast and spends a great deal of time keeping up with the freshest news on blogs such as Engadget, Gizmodo and TechCrunch. In addition, he is an art hobbyist and occasionally creates pieces that he enjoys displaying on his various art portfolios.
